languages.text: The target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If that {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} fails, the target immediately attacks its allies. After, the target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Psychic Shriek{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, and their Willpower is reduced by −{uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} until the end of combat. If the test succeeds, the target just suffers Psychic Shriek damage, and their Willpower is reduced by −{uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Цель выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала цель немедленно атакует своих союзников, а затем получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Пси-визга{/g}, и до конца боя ее Воля уменьшается на {uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b}. В случае успеха цель получает урон от Пси-визга, и до конца боя ее Воля уменьшается на {uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b}.

traits.locale_text: The target makes a Willpower resistance test. If that test fails, the target immediately attacks it's allies. After that the target suffers damage from Psychic Shriek, and their Willpower is reduced by −10+2×(Psyker's psy rating) until the end of combat. If the test succeeds, the target just suffers damage from Psychic Scream, and their Willpower is reduced by −10+2×(Psyker's psy rating) until the end of combat.

The target makes a Willpower resistance test. If that test fails, the target immediately attacks its allies. After, the target suffers damage from Psychic Shriek, and their Willpower is reduced by −(10 + 2 × psyker's psy rating) until the end of combat. If the test succeeds, the target just suffers damage from Psychic Scream, and their Willpower is reduced by −(10 + 2 × psyker's psy rating) until the end of combat.

The target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If that {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} fails, the target immediately attacks its allies. After, the target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Psychic Shriek{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, and their Willpower is reduced by −{uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} until the end of combat. If the test succeeds, the target just suffers Psychic Shriek damage, and their Willpower is reduced by −{uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} until the end of combat.

The target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If that {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} fails, the target immediately attacks its allies. After, the target suffers damage from {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Psychic Shriek{/g}, and their Willpower is reduced by −{uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} until the end of combat. If the test succeeds, the target just suffers damage from Psychic Scream, and their Willpower is reduced by −{uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} until the end of combat.

languages.text: Цель выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала цель немедленно атакует своих союзников, а затем получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Пси-визга{/g}, и до конца боя ее Воля уменьшается на {uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b}. В случае успеха цель получает урон от Пси-визга, и до конца боя ее Воля уменьшается на {uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b}.

If that {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} fails, the target immediately attacks its allies. After, the target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Psychic Shriek{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, and their Willpower is reduced by −{uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} until the end of combat. If the test succeeds, the target just suffers Psychic Shriek damage, and their Willpower is reduced by −{uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Цель выполняет проверку Воли на сопротивление. В случае провала цель немедленно атакует своих союзников, а затем получает урон от Пси-визга, и до конца боя ее Воля уменьшается на (10 + 2 × пси-рейтинг псайкера). В случае успеха цель получает урон от Пси-визга, и до конца боя ее Воля уменьшается на (10 + 2 × пси-рейтинг псайкера).

Цель выполняет проверку Воли на сопротивление. В случае провала цель немедленно атакует своих союзников, а затем получает урон от Пси-визга, и до конца боя ее Воля уменьшается на (10 + 2 × пси-рейтинг псайкера). В случае успеха цель получает урон от Пси-визга, и до конца боя ее Воля уменьшается на (10 + 2 × пси-рейтинг псайкера).

Цель выполняет проверку Воли на сопротивление. В случае провала цель немедленно атакует своих союзников, а затем получает урон от Пси-визга, и до конца боя ее Воля уменьшается на {uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b}. В случае успеха цель получает урон от Пси-визга, и до конца боя ее Воля уменьшается на {uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b}.

languages.text: 目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}失败，目标会立刻攻击盟友。在此之后，目标会受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}灵能狂啸{/g}造成的伤害，且意志降低{uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b}点，效果持续至战斗结束。 若检定成功，目标只会受到灵能尖叫造成的伤害，意志降低{uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b}点，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: The target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If that {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} fails, the target immediately attacks its allies. After, the target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Psychic Shriek{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, and their Willpower is reduced by −{uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} until the end of combat. If the test succeeds, the target just suffers Psychic Shriek damage, and their Willpower is reduced by −{uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}失败，目标会立刻攻击盟友。在此之后，目标会受到伤害，等同于灵能狂啸造成的伤害，且意志降低（10+2×灵能者的灵能等级），效果持续至战斗结束。 若检定成功，目标只会受到灵能尖叫造成的伤害，且意志降低（10+2×灵能者的灵能等级），效果持续至战斗结束。

目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}失败，目标会立刻攻击盟友。在此之后，目标会受到伤害，等同于灵能狂啸造成的伤害，且意志降低{uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b}，效果持续至战斗结束。 若检定成功，目标只会受到灵能尖叫造成的伤害，且意志降低{uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b}，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: El objetivo realiza una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}. Si falla esta {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g}, el objetivo ataca inmediatamente a sus aliados. Después, el objetivo sufre el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Grito psíquico{/g} y su Voluntad se reduce en −{uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} hasta el final del combate. Si supera la prueba, el objetivo solamente sufre el daño de Grito psíquico y su Voluntad se reduce en −{uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: The target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If that {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} fails, the target immediately attacks its allies. After, the target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Psychic Shriek{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, and their Willpower is reduced by −{uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} until the end of combat. If the test succeeds, the target just suffers Psychic Shriek damage, and their Willpower is reduced by −{uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: El objetivo realiza una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}. Si falla esta {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g}, el objetivo ataca inmediatamente a sus aliados. Después, el objetivo sufre el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Grito psíquico{/g} y su Voluntad se reduce en −{uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} hasta el final del combate. Si supera la prueba, el objetivo solamente sufre el daño de Aullido psíquico y su Voluntad se reduce en −{uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} hasta el final del combate.

El objetivo realiza una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} . Si falla esta {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g}, el objetivo ataca inmediatamente a sus aliados. Después, el objetivo sufre el daño de Grito psíquico y su Voluntad se reduce en −{uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} hasta el final del combate. Si supera la prueba, el objetivo solamente sufre el daño de Aullido psíquico y su Voluntad se reduce en −{uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: Das Ziel führt eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} durch. Wenn diese {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} misslingt, greift das Ziel sofort seine Verbündeten an. Danach erleidet das Ziel „{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Psionischer Schrei{/g}“-{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und seine Willenskraft wird bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −{uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} reduziert. Gelingt die Probe, erleidet das Ziel nur „Psionischer Schrei“-Schaden und seine Willenskraft wird bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −{uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} reduziert.
languages.original_text: The target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If that {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} fails, the target immediately attacks its allies. After, the target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Psychic Shriek{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, and their Willpower is reduced by −{uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} until the end of combat. If the test succeeds, the target just suffers Psychic Shriek damage, and their Willpower is reduced by −{uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Das Ziel führt eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} durch. Wenn diese {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} misslingt, greift das Ziel sofort seine Verbündeten an. Danach erleidet das Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Psionischer Schrei{/g} und seine Willenskraft wird bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −{uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} reduziert. Gelingt die Probe, wird das Ziel nur durch Psionischer Schrei geschädigt und seine Willenskraft bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −{uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} reduziert.

Das Ziel führt eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} durch. Wenn diese {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} misslingt, greift das Ziel sofort seine Verbündeten an. Danach erleidet das Ziel Schaden durch Psionischer Schrei und seine Willenskraft wird bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −{uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} reduziert. Gelingt die Probe, wird das Ziel nur durch Psionischer Schrei geschädigt und seine Willenskraft bis zum Ende das Kampfes um −{uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} reduziert.

languages.text: La cible passe un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g}. Si elle échoue au {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, elle attaque immédiatement ses alliés. Elle subit ensuite les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Cri Psychique{/g}, et sa Force Mentale est réduite de −{uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Si elle réussit le test, elle subit juste les dégâts de Cri Psychique, et sa Force Mentale est réduite de −{uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: The target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If that {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} fails, the target immediately attacks its allies. After, the target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Psychic Shriek{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, and their Willpower is reduced by −{uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} until the end of combat. If the test succeeds, the target just suffers Psychic Shriek damage, and their Willpower is reduced by −{uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: La cible passe un {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}test de résistance{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Volonté{/g}. Si elle échoue au {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, elle attaque immédiatement ses alliés. Elle subit ensuite les dégâts de Cri Psychique, et sa Volonté est réduite de -(10 + 2 × indice psy du psyker) jusqu'à la fin du combat. Si elle réussit le test, elle subit juste les dégâts de Cri Psychique, et sa Volonté est réduite de -(10 + 2 × indice psy du psyker) jusqu'à la fin du combat.

La cible passe un {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}test de résistance{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Volonté{/g}. Si elle échoue au {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, elle attaque immédiatement ses alliés. Elle subit ensuite les dégâts de Cri Psychique, et sa Volonté est réduite de -{uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Si elle réussit le test, elle subit juste les dégâts de Cri Psychique, et sa Volonté est réduite de -{uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行う。{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗した場合、ターゲットは即座にその味方を攻撃する。その後、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}精神の叫び{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受け、戦闘終了まで意志力が−{uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b}減少する。 判定に成功した場合、ターゲットは精神の叫びによるダメージを受け、戦闘終了まで意志力が−{uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b}減少する。
languages.original_text: The target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If that {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} fails, the target immediately attacks its allies. After, the target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Psychic Shriek{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, and their Willpower is reduced by −{uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} until the end of combat. If the test succeeds, the target just suffers Psychic Shriek damage, and their Willpower is reduced by −{uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行う。{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗した場合、ターゲットは即座にその味方を攻撃する。その後、ターゲットは精神の叫びによるダメージを受け、戦闘終了まで意志力が−(10 + 2 × 異能者の超能力レート)減少する。 判定に成功した場合、ターゲットは精神の叫びによるダメージを受け、戦闘終了まで意志力が−(10 + 2 × 異能者の超能力レート)減少する。

ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行う。{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗した場合、ターゲットは即座にその味方を攻撃する。その後、ターゲットは精神の叫びによるダメージを受け、戦闘終了まで意志力が−{uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b}減少する。 判定に成功した場合、ターゲットは精神の叫びによるダメージを受け、戦闘終了まで意志力が−{uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b}減少する。
